author: Deepshikha Sikarwar
title: DA hike for central govt employees put on hold amid virus uncertainty
description: DA hike for central govt employees put on hold amid virus uncertaintyThe govt has put on hold increase in DA for its employees because of the strain on its finances due to Covid-19.
content:
The government has put on hold increase in dearness allowance for its employees because of the strain on its finances due to Covid-19. The union cabinet will on Wednesday take up a proposal to put a hold on any further increase for the current year.
